property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, Arya Stark gains Stealth and Deadly. If Arya Stark is killed, put her into Shadows instead of your dead pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you pay 3 or more gold for a card or effect, kneel Hungry Mob.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, reduce the cost to bring your cards out of Shadows by 1. If it is Summer, return Hidden Chambers to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a kneeling Stark character. Until the end of the phase, that character is eligible, while kneeling, to be declared as a defender for any challenge in which it could normally participate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, Tyrion Lannister gets +2 STR and gains your choice of Deadly, Renown, No attachments, or Immune to Events until the end of the phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only. Stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your characters get +1 STR for each card you have in Shadows.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which City Watch is participating, choose an opponent. At the beginnig of the next phase, that player must randomly choose one of his or her cards in Shadows, and either bring it out of Shadows (paying any necessary costs) or discard it from play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you declare attackers during a Power challenge, put Kingswood Trail into Shadows to choose and kneel a character with a Power icon controlled by the defending player.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wharf Rats cannot be killed. After Wharf Rats' controller wins a challenge, discard the top card of its controller's deck. Response: After Wharf Rats comes out of Shadows, choose an opponent. That opponent takes control of Wharf Rats.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the Ironborn trait. Response: After a card is discarded from a player's deck, attached character gets +1 STR and Intimidate until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ignore the out of House gold penalty on all Greyjoy cards. Each opponent without a Treaty agenda needs 5 fewer power (to a minimum of 10) to win the game.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Kingsguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Ser Barristan Selmy comes out of Shadows, look at one opponent's hand. Then, name a non-plot card. No player can play that card during this phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. Renown. No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0. Response: After Dragon Skull comes out of Shadows, attach it to an opponent's character or discard it from play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent plays an event card, take 1 gold from the treasury and add it to your gold pold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ignore the out of House gold penalty on all Martell cards. Each opponent without a Treaty agenda needs 5 fewer power (to a minimum of 10) to win the game.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After The Shadow of the South comes out of Shadows, choose an opponent. That opponent cannot play event cards during this phase. Then, if it is Summer, return The Shadow of the South to its owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Kingsguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, choose and stand a Kingsguard character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Shadow Politics comes out of Shadows, choose a player. That player may initiate an additional Intrigue challenge against an opponent of his or her choice as a standard player action this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, you may put up to 2 cards with the Shadow crest into Shadows from your hand without paying any costs.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may ignore the "House X only" deckbuilding restriction on any card with the Shadow crest. Whenever you bring any card with a "House X only" restriction that does not match your House card out of Shadows, pay 1 additional gold. If you do not have any cards in Shadows, you cannot claim power for unopposed challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter and you have at least 1 card in Shadows, opponents cannot declare Intrigue challenges against you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Septa Mordane to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -X STR, where X is the number of cards in Shadows.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, kneel Storm Dancer to draw a card. (If it is Winter and you have at least 1 card in Shadows, draw 3 cards instead.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Queen.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which Cersei Lannister participated, choose and kneel up to X non-Army characters. X is the number of cards you control in Shadows.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Gold Cloaks comes out of Shadows, draw a card for each Mercenary character you control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only. No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After A Fistful of Coppers comes out of Shadows, move 2 gold from the treasury to your gold pool.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to choose a lannister character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Plot: Discard Moon Boy from play to choose an opponent with at least 1 plot card in his or her used plot pile. The next time that opponent must choose a plot this phase, the selection must come from his or her used plot pile. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Abandoned Forge comes out of Shadows, pay X gold to search your deck for X Weapon attachments, and attach them to Abandoned Forge. Any Phase: Kneel Abandoned Forge to move a Weapon attachment from Abandoned Forge to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only. No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a card with the Shadow crest is discarded from a player's deck, kneel 1 influence or kneel a N character to put that card into Shadows under your control. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel a Greyjoy Lord character to choose and kneel X locations. X is the STR of the knelt character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Street Waif to choose an opponent. If you have more than 1 card in your discard pile, that opponent must choose a card in your discard pile. Return the card to your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Poison.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains an Intrigue icon and Deadly. Response: After an opponent's character is killed during an Intrigue challenge, discard Tears of Lys to draw a card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After The Shadow of the East comes out of Shadows, choose and discard 1 attachment from play. Then, if it is Summer, return The Shadow of the East to its owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Flea Bottom Scavenger from your hand, draw 3 cards if you have no power on your House card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The South.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Lost Oasis to choose a Martell character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains Stealth and "after this character bypasses a character by using Stealth, kneel that character."

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play The Hound from your hand, kneel all Knight characters in play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge, choose a location controlled by the losing opponent. If that location has the Shadow crest, return it to Shadows. Otherwise, discard it from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Twilight Market to reduce the cost of the next card you play from your hand into Shadows this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose and kneel up to X characters. X is the number of City plots in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have a Baratheon House card, reduce the gold penalty to play Eddard Stark by 1. Response: Cancel a triggered effect that chooses a N character as the only target. Then, draw a card. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, move 1 gold from the treasury to your gold pool each time a card comes out of Shadows.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Tywin Lannister participated, choose a card with the Shadow crest that is currently in play. That card returns to Shadows.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Ser Jaime Lannister participated, choose and kneel a non-Army character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, look at the top card of your deck. Then, place that card on the top of your deck or on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Stand Robert Baratheon. Use this ability only if there are no cards in Shadows.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: The Any Phase ability should have the text: 'Limit 3 times per phase.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play a Lord or Lady character from your hand, put Royal Entourage into play from your hand or discard pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Warhorse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains Renown. Challenges: Unattach Jousting Steed. Then, it becomes a STR 2 character with a Military and a Power icon and "while Jousting Steed is attacking alone, no more than 1 character can be declared as a defender." At the end of the phase, return Jousting Steed to its owner's hand if it is still in play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Knight character only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After The Iron Throne comes out of Shadows, choose an opponent. If that opponent has more cards in hand than you, discard a card at random from that player's hand. Response: After an opponent draws a card outside of the draw phase, The Iron Throne goes into Shadows.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which Seaside Urchin participated, discard the top card of the losing opponent's deck. If that card is an attachment or an event card, Seaside Urchin claims 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Military challenge in which Harbor Thug participated, discard the top card of the losing opponent's deck. If that card is a character, Harbor Thug claims 1 power.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After The Shadow of the Isles comes out of Shadows, each player must choose and discard 1 non-limited location from play that he or she controls. Then, if it is Winter, return The Shadow of the Isles to its owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Merchant Spy and move 1 gold from your gold pool to an opponent's gold pool to look at that player's hand. Then, you may give that opponent an additional 1 gold to choose and discard an attachment card from his or her hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Aegon's Hill to look at an opponent's hand. You may choose one character card in that hand and place it in its owner's dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Dornish Paramour participated, discard it from play to draw 2 cards.

card.name: By the Light of the Sun

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge, the losing opponent must choose and discard one card in Shadows that he or she controls.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. House Arryn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Jon Arryn cannot be saved. Response: After Jon Arryn is killed, put a N character into play from your hand or discard pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Kingsguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Ser Preston Greenfield participated as the defender, he claims 1 power.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Pay 1 gold to cancel the effects of an event card that has just been played.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, shuffle the top X cards of your discard pile back into your deck. X is the number of City plots in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: If there are no cards in Shadows, Sansa Stark gets +2 STR, a N crest, and gains Renown.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Fool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Stand Ser Dontos Hollard to save a Lady character from being killed or discarded from play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains an Intrigue icon. Response: After Maester Malleon's Tome comes out of Shadows, attach it to a unique character. Then, if it is Winter, look at an opponent's unused plot deck, and move a plot card from that plot deck to that player's used plot pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent's character is knelt, pay 1 gold to stand Joffrey Baratheon. Then, he claims 1 power.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to triggered effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a non-Army character. Response: After a character is knelt by a triggered effect, kneel attached character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell. Lady.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, The Queen of Thorns claims 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell. Lady.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, choose a non-Lady character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box was blank.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, kneel The Black Cells to choose an opponent's character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot kneel or stand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Distinguished Boatswain gets -2 STR for each card in Shadows.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Blackwater Raiders come out of Shadows, choose a location in an opponent's discard pile. Put that location into play under your control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only. No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an opponent's character, then draw a card. Attached character cannot be saved.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an attachment or event card is discarded from a player's deck, kneel Fishmonger's Square to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: HT characters you control gain a War crest.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have at least 1 card in Shadows, any characters controlled by opponents who do not have more cards in Shadows than you do get -1 STR.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are not running an Agenda, The Red Viper gains: "Response: After The Red Viper is killed, kill all characters in play."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge by 4 or more total STR as the defender, all characters controlled by the attacker lose a Military , an Intrigue , and a Power icon until the end of the phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Syrio Forel participated, put him into Shadows.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: If The Red Keep would leave play, it goes into Shadows instead of going to its owner's hand, deck, discard, or dead pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control at least 1 Kingsguard character, claim 1 power for your House each time you successfully defend a challenge. Each time you lose a challenge as the attacker, kneel a standing Kingsguard character you control or discard 1 power from your House.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, you may trigger the "when revealed" effect of any City plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Discard Jeyne Poole from play to cancel the triggered effect of a card that just came out of Shadows.

card.name: Cannot be Bribed, Cannot be Bought

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character is knelt by an opponent's card effect, stand that character. Then, that character claims 1 power and you draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Qyburn comes out of Shadows, choose a non-Army character in an opponent's dead pile. Put that character into play under your control. If that character is still in play at the end of the phase, return it to its owner's dead pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only. Deadly.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Littlefinger does not kneel to attack. Reduce the cost to play Littlefinger by 1 for each card in Shadows.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stealth. No Condition attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character triggers its character ability, kneel Ser Ilyn Payne or a N to kill that character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Knight. House Tyrell.

property.name: Text
property.value: If there are no cards in Shadows, Knight of Flowers does not kneel to attack or defend.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win an Intrigue challenge, Small Council Chamber goes into Shadows. Response: After Small Council Chamber comes out of Shadows, return a Small Council event from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ancient Mariner gets -3 STR during Military challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose and stand a kneeling character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After King's Landing Assassin comes out of Shadows, choose a character with no attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Shadow Prophet comes out of Shadows, you may look at 1 card in Shadows controlled by each opponent.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Visenya's Hill to choose 1 character card in any discard pile, and move that card to its owner's dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Choose a character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -X STR and is killed if its STR is 0. X is the number of cards currently in Shadows.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Power challenge in which Dornish Diplomat participated, choose and stand a character controlled by an opponent. Then, choose and stand a character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel The Broken Spear to choose attached character. Until the end of the phase, that character either gains or loses a Military icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Backroom Bribery comes out of Shadows, choose an opponent. Move 1 gold from that player's gold pool to yours.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: After Varys comes out of Shadows, choose and discard 1 Ally character from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Kingsguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Ser Osmund Kettleblack to choose a defending character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR (+4 STR instead if that character has the Kingsguard trait).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a card comes out of Shadows, stand King's Landing. Any Phase: Kneel King's Landing to draw a card. Use this ability only if you control more King's Landing locations than each opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, look at the top X cards of any player's deck, discard one of those cards, and put the rest on top of that deck in any order. X is the number of City plots in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play Weapon attachments on Peasant Defenders by 1. If Peasant Defenders has a Weapon attachment, they get +3 STR and do not kneel to defend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Northern Steel cannot be discarded from play while attached to a Stark character. Any Phase: Kneel Northern Steel to give attached character either +3 STR or deadly until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a card comes out of Shadows, kneel Alchemist's Guild Hall to choose and kneel a character or location that does not have the Shadow crest.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should Read: 'Limited response: After a card comes out of Shadows, kneel Alchemist's Guild Hall to choose and kneel a character or location that does not have the Shadow crest. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)'

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a location. Kneel that location. If you lose a Military challenge, discard Tyrion's Chain from play. Response: After attached location is knelt, kneel all locations controlled by the attached location's controller.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel Ser Davos Seaworth to save an atttachment on a character from being discarded from play. Then, attach it to another eligible character, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Summer or Winter, kneel King Robert's Hammer. Any Phase: Kneel King Robert's Hammer to choose and stand a Baratheon character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Power challenge, kneel Blackwater Bay to choose a card with the Shadow crest in your discard pile, and place that card in Shadows.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Island Mercenaries participated, they claim 1 power.

property.value: House Greyjoy only. Renown. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Cancel an effect that would save a card from being killed or discarded from play. Then, draw a card.

property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.value: Army. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character with STR 2 or lower is killed, stand Free Cities Mercenaries.

property.value: House Targaryen only. Renown. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have at least 1 gold in your gold pool, attached character does not kneel to attack or defend during Military challenges.

property.value: W character only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel and discard Rhaenys's Hill from play to put all characters in a single opponent's dead pile into play under your control until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, return those characters to their owner's dead pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Southron Mercenaries participated, move 1 power from the losing opponent's House card to your own.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only. Renown. No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Veteran Spearman to choose an opponent's character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be chosen to die as the result of Military challenge claim.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: After Venomous Blade comes out of Shadows, attach it to a character you control. Then, choose and kill an opponent's character with printed STR 2 or less. Response: After you lose a challenge, Venomous Blade goes into Shadows.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a Military icon, a War crest, and +3 STR.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Kingsguard.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Bring Ser Mandon Moore out of Shadows and into play by paying the rest of his gold cost. Response: After you win a challenge in which Ser Mandon Moore participated as the defender, choose and kill a participating character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Pyromancer's Apprentice comes out of Shadows, choose a location controlled by an opponent. That location's controller must pay 1 gold to you or discard that location from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Epic Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single Military challenge. In addition to the normal claim effect, the winner of each challenge chooses and returns a King's Landing location from his or her discard pile to his or her hand, if able. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of this epic phase, then discard it.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose and kill a character with STR X or lower. X is the number of City plot cards in your used pile.
